data.description: console based Usenet news searching toolset
data.communities: newsgroups, sf.net(open forums, CVS repository, etc)
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The following CPAN Modules (which covers more than Perl 5 Module
    List) have been consulted before jumping in:

    News::Article Object for handling Usenet articles in mail or news
    form. News-Article-1.27 - 11 Aug 2002 - Andrew P. J. Gierth

    News::Scan gather and report Usenet newsgroup statistics
    News-Scan-0.51 - 17 Dec 1997 - Greg Bacon

    News::Scan::Article collect information about news articles
    News-Scan-0.51 - 17 Dec 1997 - Greg Bacon

    News::Newsrc manage newsrc files News-Newsrc-1.08 - 17 Mar 2001 -
    Steven McDougall

    News::GnusFilter package for scoring usenet posts
    News-GnusFilter-0.55 - 20 Sep 2001 - Joe Schaefer

    News::NNTPClient Perl 5 module to talk to NNTP (RFC977) server
    NNTPClient-0.37 - 28 Mar 2001 - Rodger V. Anderson

    News::Gateway Tools for gatewaying messages between news and mail.
    Gateway-0.42 - 17 Apr 1998 - Russ Allbery

    News::AutoReply derivative of News::Article for generating
    autoreplies News-Article-1.27 - 11 Aug 2002 - Andrew P. J. Gierth

    News::FormReply derivative of News::FormArticle and News::AutoReply
    News-Article-1.27 - 11 Aug 2002 - Andrew P. J. Gierth

    News::NNTPFetchProgress NNTPClient-0.37 - 28 Mar 2001 - Rodger V.
    Anderson

    Mail::Folder::NNTP An NNTP folder interface for Mail::Folder.
    MailFolder-0.07 - 05 Apr 1998 - Kevin Johnson

    Library::News Perl extension for managing an XML news file
    Library-News-0.05 - 16 Jan 2002 - Alberto Manuel Brandão Simões
